summary: A female theatre dresser creates a stir and sparks a revolution in seventeenth century London theatre by playing Desdemona in Othello. But what will become of the male actor she once worked for and eventually replaced?
cast: Derek Hutchinson|Mark Letheren|Claire Danes|Billy Crudup|Tom Wilkinson|Ben Chaplin|Hugh Bonneville|Jack Kempton|Alice Eve|Fenella Woolgar|David Westhead|Nick Barber|Stephen Marcus|Richard Griffiths|Zoë Tapper|Rupert Everett|Edward Fox|Robin Dunn|Isabella Calthorpe|Andy Merchant|John Street|John Tannen|Tom Hollander|Hermione Gulliford|Clare Higgins|Madeleine Worrall|Greg Bennett|Gary Bunn|Nancy Chandler|David Decio|James Dodd|Ray Donn|Joyia Fitch|Sean Francis George|Joe Gunn|Natalie Hallam
title: Belleza prohibida
